para.text: The top layer of the model is unconfined and so should be represented by convertible cells. In versions of MODFLOW prior to MODFLOW 6, individual cells could not be convertible. Instead an entire model layer had to be either convertible or confined. With MODFLOW 6, individual cells within a layer can be convertible. To designate a cell as convertible, specify the Cell_Type data set as having a value greater than zero for that cell.
